languages.text: {n}Каллигос переводит взгляд с Маражая на вас, а потом обратно, с потрясенным и слегка брезгливым видом.{/n} "Так... змеюка останется при мне. А ты... держи своего долговязого на привязи покороче. Тебе он явно нужнее".

{n}Calligos shifts his gaze from Marazhai to you, then back again, with a stunned and somewhat disgusted expression.{/n} "Then... the snake remains with me. And you... you keep your gangly pet on a shorter leash. You clearly need him more."
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос переводит взгляд с Маражая на вас, а потом обратно, с потрясенным и слегка брезгливым видом.{/n} "Так... змеюка останется при мне. А ты... держи своего долговязого на привязи покороче. Тебе он явно нужнее".

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos shifts his gaze from Marazhai to you, then back again, with a stunned and somewhat squeamish look.{/n} "Then... The snake remains with me. And you... Keep your gangly pet on a shorter leash. You clearly need him more."

{n}Calligos shifts his gaze from Marazhai to you, then back again, with a stunned and somewhat disgusted expression.{/n} "Then... the snake remains with me. And you... you keep your gangly pet on a shorter leash. You clearly need him more."

{n}Calligos shifts his gaze from Marazhai to you, then back again, with a stunned and somewhat disgusted expression.{/n} "Then... the snake remains with me. And you... you keep your gangly pet on a shorter leash. You clearly need him more."

languages.text: {n}La mirada de Calligos pasa de Marazhai a ti, luego otra vez a él; su expresión es de desconcierto y asco.{/n} «Entonces... la serpiente se queda conmigo. Y usted... más vale que ate en corto a su larguirucha mascota. Está claro que la necesita a su lado».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos shifts his gaze from Marazhai to you, then back again, with a stunned and somewhat disgusted expression.{/n} "Then... the snake remains with me. And you... you keep your gangly pet on a shorter leash. You clearly need him more."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada de Calligos pasa de Marazhai a ti, luego otra vez a él; su expresión es de desconcierto y una cierta repulsa.{/n} «Entonces... la serpiente se queda conmigo. Y usted... más vale que ate en corto a su larguirucha mascota. Está claro que la necesita a su lado».

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯的目光从玛拉斋移到你身上，又移了回来。他的神情中带着惊愕与厌恶。{/n}“好吧……那这条蛇就继续留在我身边吧。至于你……记得给你那根麻杆宠物拴条短点的皮带，你显然比我更需要他。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos shifts his gaze from Marazhai to you, then back again, with a stunned and somewhat disgusted expression.{/n} "Then... the snake remains with me. And you... you keep your gangly pet on a shorter leash. You clearly need him more."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯的目光从玛拉斋移到你身上，又移了回来。他的神情中带着惊愕和一丝反感。{/n}“好吧……那这条蛇就继续留在我身边吧。至于你……记得给你那根麻杆宠物拴条短点的皮带，你显然比我更需要他。”

languages.text: {n}Calligos darde son regard entre vous et Marazhai, l'air stupéfait et quelque peu dégoûté.{/n} « Ainsi... le serpent reste avec moi et vous... vous gardez votre xénos de compagnie en raccourcissant sa laisse. Il est évident que vous avez plus besoin de lui que moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos shifts his gaze from Marazhai to you, then back again, with a stunned and somewhat disgusted expression.{/n} "Then... the snake remains with me. And you... you keep your gangly pet on a shorter leash. You clearly need him more."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos darde son regard entre vous et Marazhai, l'air stupéfait et quelque peu dégoûté.{/n} « Ainsi... le serpent reste avec moi et vous... vous gardez votre xénos de compagnie en raccourcissant sa laisse. Il est évident que vous avez plus besoin de lui que moi. »

languages.text: {n}カリゴスは唖然とした表情で、マラズハイからあなたへと移し、そしてまた戻した。{/n}「ならば…蛇は俺の手元に残る。そしてお前は…お前のペットは鎖につないでおけ。明らかに彼の方が必要だろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos shifts his gaze from Marazhai to you, then back again, with a stunned and somewhat disgusted expression.{/n} "Then... the snake remains with me. And you... you keep your gangly pet on a shorter leash. You clearly need him more."

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスは唖然とした表情で、マラズハイからあなたへと移し、そしてまた戻した。{/n}「ならば…蛇は俺の手元に残る。そしてお前は…お前のペットは鎖につないでおけ。明らかに彼の方が必要だろう」

languages.text: {n}Calligos blickt von Marazhai zu dir und wieder zurück, mit erstaunter, etwas angewiderter Miene.{/n} "Dann ... bleibt die Schlange bei mir. Und Ihr ... Ihr haltet Euer schlaksiges Haustier an einer etwas kürzeren Leine. Ihr braucht ihn offensichtlich dringender."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos shifts his gaze from Marazhai to you, then back again, with a stunned and somewhat disgusted expression.{/n} "Then... the snake remains with me. And you... you keep your gangly pet on a shorter leash. You clearly need him more."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos blickt von Marazhai zu dir und wieder zurück, mit einem erstaunten, etwas unbehaglichen Blick.{/n} "Dann ... bleibt die Schlange bei mir. Und Ihr ... haltet Euer schlaksiges Haustier an einer etwas kürzeren Leine. Ihr braucht ihn offensichtlich dringender."

languages.text: {n}Calligos, bakışlarını Marazhai'dan sana çeviriyor. Ardından yüzünde sersemlemiş ve bir miktar iğrenen bir ifadeyle tekrar Marazhai'a bakıyor.{/n} "O hâlde... Yılan benimle kalacak. Sen de... Sırıktan hâllice hayvanını dizginle. Ona daha çok ihtiyacın olduğu açık."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos shifts his gaze from Marazhai to you, then back again, with a stunned and somewhat disgusted expression.{/n} "Then... the snake remains with me. And you... you keep your gangly pet on a shorter leash. You clearly need him more."
